item.description:
Linda and Ralph will host us for their traditional "Souper Supper." They will have the crockpots of soup simmering. You could bring something to round out the meal ... appetizer, bread, salad, beverage, or dessert!

After dinner, we'll have our usual raucous meeting, believe me, they are not all business! But amidst the laughter, we will plan our events for April and May.

Because this is in a private home in Middletown, you must RSVP to get directions. When you RSVP, please tell us what you will be bringing for food or drink to share.
item.name: "Souper Supper" Potluck
